Name: Coptic textile
Description: A textile fragment of wool with flax decoration.The motif consists of an oval medallion in indigo with a frayed border in blue-green. There is an interlacing design and guilloche borders added in a fine natural thread.Technique: tapestry with built-up shapes, curved weft, slits and 'soumak' decoration.Ends per inch (warp threads): 24.Picks per inch (weft threads): 120.
